class.name: CrowdControlEffectParameter
class.brief_description: Resource defining selectable parameters for Crowd Control effects.
class.description:
CrowdControlEffectParameter allows viewers to choose from a set of options when purchasing an effect (e.g., selecting a color for a cosmetic effect). Parameters are added to [CrowdControlEffect] resources and don't affect the effect's price. [codeblocks] [gdscript] # Create a color parameter var color_param = CrowdControlEffectParameter.new() color_param.parameter_name = "Color" color_param.options = { "red": "Red", "blue": "Blue", "green": "Green" }
# Add to effect var effect = CrowdControlEffect.new() effect.parameters = {"color": color_param} [/gdscript] [/codeblocks]

method.name: to_json
method.description: Converts the parameter to a Dictionary in the format expected by Crowd Control. This is used internally by [CrowdControlEffect] when exporting.

members.member: Dictionary of option_id to display_name pairs (e.g., {"red": "Red", "blue": "Blue"}). The option_id is sent with the effect request.
Display name for the parameter shown to viewers (e.g., "Color", "Difficulty").
Parameter type. Currently only "options" is supported for selectable options.
